rainbow-shooter.name: Rainbow Shooter
rainbow-shooter.description: 8 rockets that burst into all the colors of the rainbow

dragon-tail.name: Dragon Tail
dragon-tail.description: Yellow, red, and gold rockets streak in a spiral

single-star-blast.name: Single Star Blast
single-star-blast.description: Single rocket that explodes into 100 stars

crackler.name: Crackler
crackler.description: Super-loud rocket that pops and crackles as it explodes in the sky

murica.name: Murica
murica.description: Tri-color rocket that streaks the colors of the American flag across the sky

fairy-sparkler.name: Fairy Sparkler
fairy-sparkler.description: Small hand-held sparkler that is safe for ages 8+

popper.name: Popper
popper.description: Poppers that crackle and pop when thrown down on the ground

spinner.name: Spinner
spinner.description: These spinners spin while shooting small sparks

home-blast.name: Home Blast
home-blast.description: Takes down a small to medium size house

mt-st-helen-blast.name: Mount St. Helen Blast
mt-st-helen-blast.description: Suitable for taking down a mountain the size of Mount St. Helen

mole-hill-blast.name: Mole Hill Blast
mole-hill-blast.description: Explode the mole hills in your yard.

microwave-blaster.name: Microwave Blaster
microwave-blaster.description: Blow up that old microwave that's been sitting in your basement

single-wide-trailer-blaster.name: Single-wide Trailer Blaster
single-wide-trailer-blaster.description: Blow up that old single-wide that's been sitting in your backyard

watermelon-blaster.name: Watermelon Blaster
watermelon-blaster.description: Blow up a small-medium sized watermelon. For funsies!
